name: The Missing Cure
description:
Try to escape the virtual world by taking the cure and leaving the cursed world!
You got several levels you should complete at last to find the cure and escape the world that your stuck on for several decades. Good Luck finding the cure! Oh I forgot to tell you also..... it isn't easy.

-Face Aggressive Mobs

-Avoid harmful things

-Use your brain solving some puzzles

-Enjoy the experience!

 !EPILEPSY WARNING!
